name: Proplyd-cloudy
body:
# Ionization/dynamical models of proplyds

## Authors
Will Henney and Nahiely Flores.

## Components
* `models/` Cylindrically symmetric models of the physical structure of a proplyd (density, velocity, temperature, ionization state, etc), which are created by patching together multiple [Cloudy](https://nublado.org/) models.
  
* `emission/` Calculation of PPV (position-position-velocity) cubes of multiple emission lines from the physical models.  The PPV cubes can then by sliced and summed to produce spectral line profiles for arbitrary apertures or surface brightness maps.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
